# ğŸ¨ Acutrack Design System - Comprehensive Icon Guide

## ğŸš€ **Overview**

The Acutrack Design System includes a **comprehensive icon system** with **100% reliability** and **complete offline support**. Icons will always display something meaningful, regardless of font loading status, network connectivity, or browser compatibility.

## âœ¨ **Key Features**

- âœ… **2,000+ Material Symbols** - Comprehensive icon library
- âœ… **Complete Offline Support** - No external dependencies
- âœ… **Automatic Fallbacks** - Emoji/Unicode when font not loaded
- âœ… **Automatic Icon Support** - Any valid Material Symbol works instantly
- âœ… **Type Safety** - Full TypeScript support
- âœ… **Zero Configuration** - Just import and use
- âœ… **AI Assistant Ready** - Built-in prompts for AI tools

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ **Quick Start**

### **1. Installation & Import**
```tsx
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
import '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds/style.css';

// Basic usage
<Icon>home</Icon>
<Icon>settings</Icon>
<Icon>search</Icon>
```

### **2. With Sizes**
```tsx
<Icon size="xs">home</Icon>    // 12px
<Icon size="sm">home</Icon>    // 16px
<Icon size="md">home</Icon>    // 20px (default)
<Icon size="lg">home</Icon>    // 24px
<Icon size="xl">home</Icon>    // 32px
<Icon size="2xl">home</Icon>   // 40px
<Icon size="3xl">home</Icon>   // 48px
```

### **3. With Variants**
```tsx
<Icon filled>favorite</Icon>           // Filled icon
<Icon filled={false}>favorite</Icon>   // Outlined icon
<Icon weight={600}>notifications</Icon> // Custom weight
```

---

## ğŸ¯ **Props Reference**

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `children` | `string` | **Required** | Material Symbol name (e.g., 'home', 'settings') |
| `size` | `'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' \| '2xl' \| '3xl' \| string` | `'md'` | Icon size |
| `className` | `string` | `''` | Additional CSS classes |
| `filled` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether icon should be filled (1) or outlined (0) |
| `weight` | `100 \| 200 \| 300 \| 400 \| 500 \| 600 \| 700` | `400` | Font weight |
| `opticalSize` | `number` | `24` | Material Symbols optical size |
| `ariaHidden` | `boolean` | `false` | Hide from screen readers (for decorative icons) |
| `ariaLabel` | `string` | `children` | Accessible label for screen readers |
| `color` | `'primary' \| 'secondary' \| 'tertiary' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'error' \| 'info' \| 'brand-navy' \| 'brand-teal' \| 'inverse' \| 'current'` | `'current'` | Icon color variant |
| `hasHoverEffect` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether the icon should have a subtle animation on hover |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether the icon should be clickable |

---

## ğŸ¨ **Size Mapping**

| Size | CSS Class | Pixel Size | Use Case |
|------|-----------|------------|----------|
| `xs` | `text-xs` | 12px | Very small icons, inline text |
| `sm` | `text-sm` | 14px | Small icons, compact components |
| `md` | `text-base` | 16px | Default size, most common use |
| `lg` | `text-lg` | 18px | Medium icons, buttons |
| `xl` | `text-xl` | 20px | Large icons, headers |
| `2xl` | `text-2xl` | 24px | Extra large icons, prominent features |
| `3xl` | `text-3xl` | 30px | Very large icons, hero sections |

## ğŸš€ **Automatic Icon Support**

### **âœ… ANY VALID MATERIAL SYMBOL WORKS AUTOMATICALLY**

The Icon component accepts **ANY valid icon name** from Google Material Symbols. No need to maintain a predefined list or wait for library updates!

```tsx
// âœ… These all work automatically (no validation needed):
<Icon>home</Icon>                    // Common icon
<Icon>location_on</Icon>             // Previously "invalid" 
<Icon>unfold_more</Icon>             // Previously "invalid"
<Icon>brand_new_google_icon</Icon>   // Future Google icons work instantly!
```

### **ğŸŒŸ New Icons Work Immediately**
When Google adds new Material Symbols, they work instantly in your app! Browse all available icons: https://fonts.google.com/icons

## ğŸ¯ **Common Use Cases**

### **1. Inline with Text**
```tsx
<p className="text-lg flex items-center gap-2">
  <Icon>info</Icon>
  <span>Informational text</span>
</p>
```

### **2. Icon Buttons (Accessible)**
```tsx
<button 
  className="p-2.5 rounded-md hover:bg-bg-tertiary"
  aria-label="Open settings"
>
  <Icon size="lg">settings</Icon>
</button>
```

### **3. Decorative Icons (Hidden from Screen Readers)**
```tsx
<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
  <Icon ariaHidden={true}>star</Icon>
  <span>Premium Feature</span>
</div>
```

### **4. Custom Styling with Design System Colors**
```tsx
<Icon 
  size="2xl" 
  weight={600} 
  filled={true}
  className="text-system-success"
  ariaLabel="Success indicator"
>
  check_circle
</Icon>
```

### **5. Different Weights and Styles**
```tsx
{/* Light weight */}
<Icon weight={300}>favorite</Icon>

{/* Medium weight */}
<Icon weight={500}>favorite</Icon>

{/* Bold weight */}
<Icon weight={700}>favorite</Icon>

{/* Filled variant */}
<Icon filled={true}>favorite</Icon>
```

## ğŸ”— **Component Integration Examples**

### **Button Component**
```tsx
import { Button, Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// Left icon
<Button leftIcon={<Icon size="sm">add</Icon>}>
  Add Item
</Button>

// Right icon
<Button rightIcon={<Icon size="sm">arrow_forward</Icon>}>
  Continue
</Button>

// Both icons
<Button 
  leftIcon={<Icon size="sm">save</Icon>}
  rightIcon={<Icon size="sm">check</Icon>}
>
  Save & Continue
</Button>
```

### **Badge Component**
```tsx
import { Badge, Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Badge variant="success">
  <Icon color="current">check_circle</Icon>
  Success
</Badge>
```

### **Input Component**
```tsx
import { Input, Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Input 
  leftIcon={<Icon size="sm" color="current">search</Icon>}
  placeholder="Search..."
/>
```

---

## ğŸ¨ **Color Inheritance**

### **Automatic Color Inheritance**
```tsx
// Icons inherit parent text color
<button className="text-blue-600">
  <Icon>home</Icon>  {/* Will be blue */}
</button>

<div className="text-red-500">
  <Icon>error</Icon>  {/* Will be red */}
</div>
```

### **Explicit Color Control**
```tsx
// Use color="current" for explicit inheritance
<Icon color="current">settings</Icon>

// Icons adapt to parent component colors
<Badge variant="success">
  <Icon color="current">check_circle</Icon>  {/* Inherits badge color */}
</Badge>
```

---

## ğŸ”„ **Comprehensive Fallback System**

### **Automatic Fallbacks**
Icons automatically fallback when:
1. **Material Symbols font not loaded**
2. **Invalid icon name provided**
3. **Network issues prevent font loading**
4. **Browser doesn't support Material Symbols**

### **Fallback Examples**
```tsx
// Normal operation (font loaded)
<Icon>home</Icon>        // ğŸ  (Material Symbol)
<Icon>settings</Icon>    // âš™ï¸ (Material Symbol)

// Fallback mode (font not loaded)
<Icon>home</Icon>        // ğŸ  (Emoji)
<Icon>settings</Icon>    // âš™ï¸ (Emoji)

// Invalid icon
<Icon>invalid_name</Icon> // â“ (Help icon)
```

## â™¿ **Accessibility**

### **Interactive Icons**
Always provide accessible labels for interactive icons:
```tsx
<button aria-label="Close dialog">
  <Icon>close</Icon>
</button>
```

### **Decorative Icons**
Hide decorative icons from screen readers:
```tsx
<Icon ariaHidden={true}>star</Icon>
```

### **Informative Icons**
Provide descriptive labels for informative icons:
```tsx
<Icon ariaLabel="Error occurred">error</Icon>
```

## âš ï¸ **Common Mistakes to Avoid**

### **âŒ Don't Mix Icon Libraries**
```tsx
// âŒ WRONG - Mixing different icon libraries
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
import { FaHome } from 'react-icons/fa';

<div>
  <Icon>home</Icon>      {/* Design system */}
  <FaHome />             {/* Font Awesome - DON'T DO THIS */}
</div>
```

### **âŒ Don't Add External Fonts**
```html
<!-- âŒ WRONG - Adding external icon fonts -->
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
```

### **âŒ Don't Use HTML Entities**
```tsx
// âŒ WRONG - Using HTML entities directly
<span>&#x1F3E0;</span>  {/* Home emoji */}
<span>&#x2699;</span>    {/* Settings gear */}
```

---

## ğŸ”§ **Migration from Other Libraries**

### **From React Icons**
```tsx
// âŒ OLD - React Icons
import { FaHome, FaSettings } from 'react-icons/fa';
<FaHome />
<FaSettings />

// âœ… NEW - Design System
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
<Icon>home</Icon>
<Icon>settings</Icon>
```

### **From Material Icons**
```tsx
// âŒ OLD - Material Icons
<span className="material-icons">home</span>
<span className="material-icons">settings</span>

// âœ… NEW - Design System
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
<Icon>home</Icon>
<Icon>settings</Icon>
```

### **From Font Awesome**
```tsx
// âŒ OLD - Font Awesome
<i className="fas fa-home"></i>
<i className="fas fa-cog"></i>

// âœ… NEW - Design System
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
<Icon>home</Icon>
<Icon>settings</Icon>
```

## ğŸ¤– **AI Assistant Instructions**

### **CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR AI ASSISTANTS**

When working with the **Acutrack Design System** and its Icon component, follow these guidelines:

#### **1. ALWAYS Use Design System Icons**
```tsx
// âœ… CORRECT - Use design system Icon component
import { Icon } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

<Icon>home</Icon>
<Icon>settings</Icon>
<Icon>search</Icon>
```

#### **2. NEVER Use Other Icon Libraries**
```tsx
// âŒ WRONG - Don't use other icon libraries
import { FaHome, FaSettings } from 'react-icons/fa';
import { MdSearch } from 'react-icons/md';
import { HiHome } from 'react-icons/hi';
```

#### **3. NEVER Import External Icon Fonts**
```html
<!-- âŒ WRONG - Adding external icon fonts -->
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
```

#### **4. Use Valid Icon Names**
The design system supports **ANY valid Material Symbol** from Google's library. Common ones include:
- Navigation: `home`, `menu`, `arrow_back`, `arrow_forward`, `close`
- Actions: `add`, `edit`, `delete`, `save`, `cancel`, `refresh`
- Status: `check_circle`, `error`, `warning`, `info`, `help`
- Communication: `email`, `phone`, `chat`, `notifications`
- Content: `favorite`, `star`, `bookmark`, `share`
- System: `settings`, `account_circle`, `lock`, `visibility`

#### **5. Understand Fallback Behavior**
- Icons automatically fallback to emojis when font not loaded
- Invalid icons show help icon (â“)
- Complete offline support - no external dependencies

```tsx
  ariaLabel="Important notification"
>
  notifications
</Icon>
```

## ğŸ¯ **Best Practices**

### **âœ… DO:**
- Use semantic icon names that match their purpose
- Provide `aria-label` for interactive icons
- Use `ariaHidden={true}` for purely decorative icons
- Leverage the design system's color classes
- Use appropriate sizes for context
- Use `color="current"` for automatic color inheritance

### **âŒ DON'T:**
- Use icons without considering accessibility
- Mix different icon families (stick to Material Symbols)
- Use icons for pure decoration without hiding from screen readers
- Override the component's built-in centering styles
- Use hardcoded pixel values when size props are available
- Add external icon fonts to HTML

---

## ğŸš€ **Automatic Functionality**

The Icon component works automatically with the design system:

1. **Font Loading**: Automatically detects and loads Material Symbols font
2. **Color Inheritance**: Inherits colors from parent elements
3. **Responsive Scaling**: Scales with container text size
4. **Accessibility**: Provides proper ARIA attributes by default
5. **Centering**: Automatically centers icons within containers
6. **Error Handling**: Gracefully handles missing icons with warnings
7. **Fallback System**: Always displays something meaningful

---

## ğŸ“š **Available Icons**

The component supports **ALL Material Symbols icons** from Google's library. Common ones include:

- **Navigation**: `home`, `menu`, `arrow_back`, `arrow_forward`, `close`
- **Actions**: `add`, `edit`, `delete`, `save`, `cancel`, `refresh`
- **Status**: `check_circle`, `error`, `warning`, `info`, `help`
- **Communication**: `email`, `phone`, `chat`, `notifications`
- **Content**: `favorite`, `star`, `bookmark`, `share`
- **System**: `settings`, `account_circle`, `lock`, `visibility`

For a complete list, visit [Material Symbols](https://fonts.google.com/icons).

## ğŸ” **Troubleshooting**

### **Icons Not Displaying**
1. Ensure Material Symbols font is loaded in your HTML with full range support:
   ```html
   <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined:opsz,wght,FILL,GRAD@20..48,100..700,0..1,0..200">
   ```
2. Check that the icon name is correct
3. Verify the font is properly imported

### **Filled Icons or Weight Changes Not Working**
1. Ensure you're using the full range font URL (not the limited version)
2. Check browser developer tools to verify font variation settings are applied
3. Clear browser cache to ensure new font is loaded

### **Icons Not Centering**
1. The component handles centering automatically
2. Avoid overriding the built-in centering styles
3. Use the component's size props instead of custom CSS

### **Build Errors**
1. Make sure you're using the `size` prop instead of hardcoded classes
2. Check that all Icon components are properly imported
3. Verify that the font loading URL is correct

### **Accessibility Issues**
1. Always provide `aria-label` for interactive icons
2. Use `ariaHidden={true}` for decorative icons
3. Test with screen readers
